QString SolarSystem::getPlanetHashString(void)
{
QString str;
QTextStream oss(&str);
foreach (const PlanetP& p, systemPlanets)
{
if (!p->getParent().isNull() && p->getParent()->getEnglishNa
me() != "Sun")
{
oss << p->getParent()->getEnglishName() << " : ";
}
oss << p->getEnglishName() << endl;
}
return str;
}
